summary: Tony and Jose are best friends and petty crooks, but tension strikes the duo when Jose falls for the rich Clemence and wants to go straight.
cast: Vincent Cassel|Diane Kruger|Izm|Frédérique Bel|Hafid F. Benamar|Delfynn Delage|Vincent Desagnat|Diam's|Dan Herzberg|Eric Judor|Gilles Lellouche|François Levantal|Ismaël Sy Savané|Franck Sinius|Omar Sy|Fred Testot|Celine Tran|Pauline Moingeon Vallès
title: Lascars
